He is currently a 4<sup>th</sup>-year Ph.D. student in the [School of Computer Science and Engineering](https://cse.sysu.edu.cn) at [Sun Yat-sen University](https://www.sysu.edu.cn/sysuen) <img src='./images/sysu_logos_nobg.png' style='width: 6em;'> (ä¸­å±±å¤§å­¦è®¡ç®—æœºå­¦é™¢), supervised by [Prof. Xiaohua Xie (è°¢æ™“åæ•™æˆ)](https://cse.sysu.edu.cn/content/2478), and also co-supervised by [Prof. Jianhuang Lai (èµ–å‰‘ç…Œæ•™æˆ)](https://cse.sysu.edu.cn/content/2498).

His research interests span AIGC, 3D Reconstruction, Medical Image Processing and the longstanding challenges on image and video, such as object detection and segmentation. He has published some papers at the top international CV journals and conferences, such as IJCV, IEEE TIP, IEEE TCSVT, ICCV and CVPR. He has served as a reviewer of IEEE TIP, IEEE TCSVT, CVPR, ICCV, ECCV, and ICME.
